description:
Solitaire : Drop's Odyssey
Play Solitaire : Drop's Odyssey – it's great fun card game!
Solitaire : Drop's Odyssey, from the creators of Mechanicus!

Solitaire is a legendary card game! Its other name is Patience, a word that's originally French, and you certainly can't rush through a hand! Solitaire trains your brain, develops your logic, intelligence and patience better than any other game.

Solitaire : Drop's Odyssey has absorbed the best formats used in card games like Spider Solitaire, Klondike Solitaire, Pyramid Solitaire and FreeCell Solitaire!

Collect valuable cards, pick locks, and tear off lianas and chains to complete this awesome game!
Use the Joker skillfully: It can replace any card!
Compete with other players from the world over and get a top ranking!
Share your achievements with your friends on Facebook.

The music and dynamic backgrounds will entrance you and soothe your senses.
Solitaire: Drop's Odyssey is a free game, which means you can download it without paying a cent!

Playing Solitaire isn't just a way to pass the time. It helps your concentration and develops your powers of logic and lateral thinking. The difficulty level gradually increases, organically improving your brain function.

If you play card games like blackjack, poker, Spider Solitaire, classic Solitaire, mahjong, Casino Solitaire or Pyramid Solitaire, then this logic-based Solitaire game is for you!
There are loads of different strategies for completing Solitaire apps, so you just have to pick the one that you find best for solving the puzzles that define modern Solitaire.
Play Solitaire totally free. These original Solitaire-based card games help to train your brain.
Do you like to download games for free and play card games without any restrictions? Then download Solitaire totally free today!

Solitaire - drop's odyssey is completely free to play but some in-game items will require payment.

Card games with a twist are the best brain teasers. Try to solve a hand of Solitaire using a Joker!
Solitaire: Drop’s Odyssey is a brand new free app for Android. Don’t expect a typical card game – this is an unusual form of Solitaire that has elements of mahjong and Pyramid Solitaire.
Playing Solitaire is the best way to unwind!

Solitaire: Drop’s Odyssey is perfect for anyone who loves playing classic card games.
